Unlike the first one which was organic. In the first game\, I didn’t even notice how attached to Joel I was until he he got severely hurt. I was surprised. I’m a slow gamer as it is\, and this game took forever. You can tell there is a message being pushed. Whether or not you like the message I believe is a personal decision every individual has the right to make. And for those who do not like the message should not be condemned.
